meanings.definition: A type of plant known for its long, sword-shaped leaves.
meanings.sent1: I have two beautiful sansevierias in my living room.
meanings.sent2: The sansevierias in the garden are thriving in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to hide behind the tall sansevierias, thinking it was invisible.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to grow as strong as the sansevierias in the wild was inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the sansevierias stood out against the dark soil.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'sansevieria', referring to multiple plants of this type.
meanings.sent1: She bought three sansevierias to decorate her office.
meanings.sent2: The sansevierias in the greenhouse need to be watered regularly.
meanings.sent3: The room was filled with the calming presence of the clustered sansevierias.
meanings.sent4: The community garden flourished with various sansevierias, creating a beautiful display.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling different types of sansevierias.
